abstract: Kent Hull played a significant part in the rebirth of the Bills in the late 1980s. He was one of the N.F.L.'s best centers and most respected leaders.
snippet: Kent Hull played a significant part in the rebirth of the Bills in the late 1980s. He was one of the N.F.L.'s best centers and most respected leaders.
lead_paragraph: Kent Hull played a significant part in the rebirth of the Bills in the late 1980s. He was one of the N.F.L.'s best centers and most respected leaders. Hull died on Tuesday of intestinal bleeding, according to a coroner's report. He was 50 years old. A few thoughts:

headline.main: Remembering Kent Hull, a Bills Mainstay
